seo.summaryTitle: Careers – Sales Job Openings Across Slovenia
seo.html:
Sales Employment – Discover Job Openings at Win Win D.o.o.

Win Win D.o.o. regularly posts job openings for various sales positions throughout Slovenia. If you're looking for work in sales that offers high earnings, opportunities for advancement, and a dynamic work environment, you're in the right place. Our company is looking for field salespeople, promoters, call center sales agents, sales team leaders, B2B consultants, team leaders, sales managers, and other professionals in telecommunications services sales for end customers.

Job Openings – Currently Open Positions

At Win Win D.o.o., the following sales positions are available:

1. Field Sales / Field Sales Advisor (All of Slovenia)
We're looking for dynamic and communicative individuals for field sales of telecommunications services. Work includes visiting customers at home as well as at promotional locations, shopping centers, and other points. We offer: thorough training, high commissions, pre-prepared address databases, opportunities for advancement, work equipment, and support from experienced mentors. Suitable for beginners and experienced salespeople.

2. Call Center / Telephone Sales Agent (Ljubljana, Maribor)
For work in our call center, we're looking for salespeople with good communication skills and a results-oriented mindset. Work includes outbound calls to customers, presenting offers, consulting, and closing contracts by phone. We offer: pre-prepared databases, daily fresh marketing contacts (Optispin, TellyNet), possibility of working from home, training, CRM tools. Suitable for students, beginners, and experienced professionals.

3. Sales Team Leader / Team Leader (Ljubljana, Kranj)
We're looking for experienced sales professionals with leadership skills to lead sales teams. Tasks include: leading a team of 5-10 salespeople, coaching, monitoring results, implementing sales strategies, team motivation. We offer: higher base salary, bonuses for team results, car allowance, training, clear career path. Experience in sales and leadership required.

4. B2B Sales Consultant (All of Slovenia)
For business sales, we're looking for experienced salespeople in telecommunications who will be responsible for acquiring new business clients, building relationships with companies, and selling telecommunications solutions for businesses. Work includes: meetings with business clients, preparing offers, negotiations, closing larger contracts. We offer: high commissions for B2B deals, company car, access to business clients, back-office team support.

5. Promotions / Sales Consultant (Shopping Centers Throughout Slovenia)
For promotional sales activities in shopping centers, we're looking for sales consultants to sell telecommunications services to customers. Work includes: stands in shopping centers, direct contact with customers, consulting, closing contracts. We offer: flexible work schedules, weekend work, attractive commissions, training, promotional materials.

6. Sales Manager (Ljubljana)
For leading larger sales units, we're looking for an experienced sales manager with proven results. Responsibilities include: leading multiple sales teams, sales strategy, planning, results analysis, reporting to management, developing new sales channels. We offer: management salary, bonuses, company car, access to top management.

7. Student Work in Sales (Ljubljana, Kranj)
For students who want to work while studying, we offer student work in sales in the field or call center. Work includes: flexible schedules (afternoons, weekends), training, earning opportunity, gaining work experience. Suitable for students of all fields who want to develop sales and communication skills.

How to Apply for Job Openings?

Applying for a job at Win Win D.o.o. is simple. Visit our website, select the position that interests you, and fill out the application form. Attach your resume (CV) and a short cover letter describing why you want to work in sales and what you can bring to our team.

After submitting your application, our HR team will review your application and invite you for an interview if suitable. The interview can take place in person at our office or via video call, depending on your location and the position you're applying for.

What to Expect at a Sales Job Interview?

The interview for employment at Win Win D.o.o. takes place in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. The purpose of the interview is to get to know you, your ambitions, motivation, and determine if you're suitable for work in our sales team. The interview typically includes: company presentation, your presentation, questions about your experiences and motivation for sales work, sales situation scenarios, and answers to your questions.

After a successfully completed interview, an offer for employment or student work follows, along with scheduling training. Training lasts from a few days to two weeks, depending on the position, and includes theory, practical exercises, and hands-on work with a mentor.

What Are the Requirements for Sales Work?

Requirements for employment at Win Win D.o.o. depend on the position, but basic requirements include: minimum age of 18 years, good knowledge of Slovenian language (native or excellent knowledge), communication skills, confidence, motivation, results and goal orientation, willingness to work in the field, call center, or office, responsibility, reliability, team player mindset.

For some positions (team leader, manager, B2B), experience in sales, leadership, or business environment is also required. For entry positions (sales consultant), experience is not necessary – we provide thorough training.

Why Choose a Sales Career at Win Win D.o.o.?

A sales career at Win Win D.o.o. offers numerous advantages: high earnings (commission system enables monthly incomes from 1,500 to 5,000 EUR net or more), fast advancement (from salesperson to team leader in 12-24 months), thorough training (sales techniques, communication, CRM tools), dynamic environment (working with customers, teamwork, motivational events), flexibility (choice of locations, positions), stability (working with leading partners, long-term cooperation, legal security), career development (clear career path, mentorship, training), extras (bonuses, awards, competitions, team buildings, recognition).

Sales Career for Students – Student Work with High Earnings

Win Win D.o.o. is an excellent choice for students who want to do student work in sales while studying. We offer flexible schedules adapted to study obligations, possibility of working in the afternoon, on weekends. Students with us gain valuable work experience, develop communication and sales skills, and earn more than at typical student jobs (food delivery, retail work, hostess work).

Many of our successful employees started their careers as student workers at Win Win. After completing their studies, they were employed with us full-time and are building long-term careers in sales.

Employment Without Experience – Start Your Career With Us

If you don't have sales experience, no problem. Win Win D.o.o. offers sales work for beginners without experience. Our training program is designed so you'll quickly master sales techniques, communication skills, CRM tool usage, telephone sales, field work, and all other skills needed for successful sales work.

All new employees receive mentorship from experienced salespeople and leaders who guide them through the first weeks of work, help with their first sales, and encourage them to achieve results. With the right approach and motivation, even beginners without experience can quickly become successful salespeople with high earnings.

Employment for Experienced Salespeople – Advance to Leadership Positions

If you're an experienced salesperson looking for new challenges, higher earnings, and opportunities to advance to leadership positions, Win Win D.o.o. is the right choice. We offer positions for team leaders, sales managers, B2B consultants, and other leadership roles where you can contribute to the company's success and development of sales teams with your experience.

Experienced salespeople at Win Win have access to larger projects, business clients, and bonus programs. We value experience, knowledge, and results, and offer competitive employment conditions.

Apply Today and Start Your Sales Career!

Don't wait any longer – sales job openings at Win Win D.o.o. are available today. Visit our website, view open positions, choose the one that matches your ambitions, and apply. Your path to a successful sales career starts here. Become part of the winning team at Win Win D.o.o. and discover how far a sales career can take you!
